message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe holds immense value. Given its quality and unique features, we're confident it could significantly benefit you. We're extending this exclusive opportunity for you to own it at an introductory price of $100. We believe this is a fair offer considering the market value and the benefits you'll receive. Looking forward to your consideration.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm on a tight budget and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
